item.title: hugo博客搭建教程！(一)
item.description: windows安装choco 使用window打开powershell，在终端输入安装指令即可 1 Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) choco –version 查看版本
